tool.name: tool_0

param.name: RESAMPLING
param.dialogReference:
Resampling

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] Nearest Neighbour

[1] Bilinear Interpolation

[2] Bicubic Spline Interpolation

[3] B-Spline Interpolation

Default: 3

tool.summary: Spatial Join: Retrieves information from the selected grids at the positions of the points of the selected points layer and adds it to the resulting layer.
